data.name: Night Racer - Emote Pack
data.detailed_description: Get access to 15 more emotes, show it off as you race against others online! Show them who's the boss. This pack is part of the Night Racer - Night Club bundle. Buy it to save more
data.about_the_game: Get access to 15 more emotes, show it off as you race against others online! Show them who's the boss. This pack is part of the Night Racer - Night Club bundle. Buy it to save more
data.short_description: Get access to more emotes, show it off as you race against others online! Show them who's the boss.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300 @3.1GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k or greater, 3.3ghz+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 / 2060super or greater

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS Sierra - 10.12.6
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Intel Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mint 18 / Ubuntu 16.04.01
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300 @3.1GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
